feed.title: Kubetail Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add oidc plugin for k8s client by @SoulKyu in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/212
  • Update README.md by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/213
  • Update README.md by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/214

New Contributors

  • @SoulKyu made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.3.2...cli/v0.3.3

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for --kubeconfig flag to serve and logs sub-commands by @rxinui in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/222
  • Enable in-cluster log search using ripgrep by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/227
  • sec: upgrade react-router (CVE-2025-43865) by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.3.3...cli/v0.4.0

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • cli: remove kubeconfig noisy logs by @rxinui in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.4.0...cli/v0.4.1

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable logfeed fetch from Cluster API in desktop temporarily by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.4.1...cli/v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable search when Kubetail Cluster API is available by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/233
  • Add cache to informer authorizer and unit tests by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/234
  • Fix wrap bug by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/235
  • Increase rate limits for kubernetes client-go by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/236

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.4.2...cli/v0.4.3
